short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates an QR Code of the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Did you ever been on a webpage that you wanted to check on your mobile device? Or did you ever been in a situation where you wanted to share a url with someone next to you? Well this extension may offer a solution. With just one click we created a small and easy readable QR code of the current page. Nothing more and nothing less ;)
